timeline.message:
Add `RequestLogProperty.NAME`

Related: #1931
Motivation:

A user may want to specify the name of a request manually, rather than
relying on `RpcRequest.method()`.

Modifications:

- Add `RequestLogProperty.NAME`, `RequestOnlyLog.name()` and
  `RequestLogBuilder.name(String)`.
- Add `BuiltInProperty.REQ_NAME`
- Set `RequestLog.name()` for:
  - Thrift clients and services
  - gRPC clients and services
  - Retrofit clients
  - Annotated services
- Use `RequestLog.name()` instead of `RpcRequest.method()` wherever
  applicable.
  - `MeterIdPrefixFunction`
  - `AccessLogComponent`
  - `{Client,Service}RequestContextAdapter`
- Make `MeterIdPrefixFunction.activeRequestPrefix()` is invoked when
  `REQUEST_START_TIME`, `REQUEST_HEADERS`, `SESSION` and `NAME` are
  available.
  - `REQUEST_CONTENT` is not available anymore.
- Miscellaneous:
  - Give up counting `StringBuilder` capacity and use a thread-local
    buffer in `DefaultRequestLog`.
  - Fix a regression in `Brave{Client,Service}` where thread-local
    context is not pushed.
  - Fix blocking operation warning in `BraveIntegrationTest`

Result:

- Closes #1931
- A user can specify a custom request name.
